name: Midnight Heist (ItsGeppy)
description:
NOTE! - Download the game for the best experience!

You're a thief who is afraid of darkness, but your boss doesn't know that and he sends you out to do his dirty work in the middle of the night. You must stay on the edge of darkness so you don't pass out and don't get caught by the guards.

Keyboard:
- QWERTY / AZERTY for movement
- Escape for pause menu
- F to interact
- R to restart
- Space to drag/hold

Controller (Xbox):
- Left joystick for movement
- Start or B for pause menu
- X or Y to interact
- Select to restart
- A or RT to drag/hold

This game was made for VimJam 2 (10 days)
Requirement: Boss
Theme: On the edge

This is a very short experience (5-15 minutes), but I hope you enjoy it nonetheless. Thank you for playing!

Linux and Mac builds are not tested, please let me know if they worked or not!

Font: https://kenney.nl/assets/kenney-fonts
Music: patrickdearteaga.com
